page.title: 19SCHOOLS IN THE AREA
page.content: There are seven schools within the area,all are primary,except Nugent House which is a maladjusted school for boys.The others in Billinge are, Chapel End C.P., Birchley St. Mary's, which is a Catholic school and St. Aidan's, which is a Church of England school and partly aided by them. In Garswood there is the Gerard Infants school, which is a Catholic school, and Garswood C.P.school, also in that area at Downall Green there is the Rectory school. At Chapel End there are 339 children who are split into infants and juniors There are 14 staff and one part time.Subjects taught are english,maths geography,history,science,computing and swimming. Clubs include choir, knitting and barn dancing. At Nugent House there are 60 boys, 9 teachers,14 care staff and 11 domestic
